label: 院蔵人所
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
見出し読み: いんのくろうどどころ
説明文: This office and its officials, the In-no-kurōdo (Ex-Sovereign's Private Secretaries) bore the same relation to the Ex-Sovereign as did the Sovereign's Private Office (kurōdodokoro) and the Sovereign's Private Secretaries (Kurōdo) to the Sovereign (Tennō ). [院蔵人、蔵人所、蔵人、天皇]
